CatDescriptText: Article accompanying image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 9, 1958, pg. 13, reads: "Rev. J. Butler Sets 70th Anniversary - The Rev. John Hiram Butler, 91, who was traveled around the world will celebrate his 70th year in Christian ministry Aug. 10, by preaching at Union Baptist Church, East Pittsburgh at 11 A. M., and at Macedonia Baptist Church, Duquesne, at 3:30 P. M. ...The nonagenarian, who says he has walked 126,980 miles to spread the gospel around the world, was born Aug. 14, 1867 and ordained to preach Aug. 17, 1888..."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of nonagenarian Baptist Rev. John Hiram Butler wearing vestments, holding book, and posed with finger raised, in Charles "Teenie" Harris' yard, 7604 Mulford Street, Homewood
